meanings.definition: A container in which flowers and other plants are grown.
meanings.sent1: My mom bought new flowerpots to plant colorful flowers in our garden.
meanings.sent2: The garden center had a variety of flowerpots in different sizes and colors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the flowerpots for hiding spots for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden, with memories blooming in the flowerpots of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The flowerpots on the windowsill danced in the sunlight, their petals reaching for warmth.

meanings.definition: A decorative container used for holding flowers or plants.
meanings.sent1: The elegant flowerpots on the patio added a touch of beauty to the outdoor space.
meanings.sent2: She painted unique designs on the flowerpots to make them more attractive.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the flowerpots, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a row of flowerpots, brightening up the room with its warmth.
meanings.sent5: The flowerpots in the shop window beckoned customers with their vibrant blooms.
